snippet: The Mets will be fighting the cold while trying to get off to a hot start this season. Nighttime lows at Citi Field this week were forecast to hover around the low 40s, and the cold temperatures were expected to be accompanied by blustery winds.
abstract: The Mets will be fighting the cold while trying to get off to a hot start this season. Nighttime lows at Citi Field this week were forecast to hover around the low 40s, and the cold temperatures were expected to be accompanied by blustery winds.

headline.main: A Chilly Start to the Season for the Mets
